page.title: 14CLUBS IN CASTLETOWN
page.content: {Youth Organisations Cadets-Army type training for boys Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides One Way Club-Free Church youth group Play group-and mother+toddlers Sunday School_Church of Scotland and Free Church Youth Club-twice weekly for juniors. {Adult-organisations Badminton - also youth section Darts-women's team - competition in region Football -junior and senior teams Friendship Club - senior citizens Olrig Beekeeper Association-meetings through the year,annual honey and vegetable show SWRI Young Women's Group-Church of Scotland Rifle Club
